text: (February 19, 1912 - October 29, 2007) was a Japanese movie director and screenwriter. His 1965 movie International Secret Police: Key of Keys has been famously re-dubbed and re-released as What's Up, Tiger Lily? by Woody Allen. Taniguchi died of pneumonia at a hospital in Tokyo on October 29, 2007, at the age of 95. He was married to actress Kaoru Yachigusa at the time of his death. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1912 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Movie directors from Tokyo Category:Japanese screenwriters Category:Deaths from pneumonia
title: Senkichi Taniguchi
